name: Ninja Teenz: The Revival Demo (2022)
description:
Fists of fury and blades of steel!
Journey into mystery as you explore the
world of the ’90s television phenomenon:
The Awesomely Awesome Ninja Teenz!

If you enjoy this game, please visit and register on the RETROVERSE
And if you happen to place a vote for Ninja Teenz, maybe it might become a full game!
